named-query.name: validateLogin
named-query.query: Select a from BpsUserInfo a where a.userId = :paramUserId and a.userPass = :paramUserPass

named-query.name: findProcessesByOrganizationId
named-query.query: Select a from BpsOrgProc a where a.orpOrgId = :paramOrgId

named-query.name: deleteProcess
named-query.query: Delete from BpsProcess a where a.id = :id

named-query.name: deleteProcessVersions
named-query.query: Delete from BpsProcessVer a where a.provId = :provId

named-query.name: deleteOrganization
named-query.query: Delete from BpsOrganization a where a.id = :id

named-query.name: deleteOrganizationprocesses
named-query.query: Delete from BpsOrgProc a where a.orpOrgId = :orpOrgId
